dict.acceptation: 管子；烟斗；管乐器；（管风琴的）音管；
以管输送；用管乐器演奏；尖声唱；
吹奏管乐器；尖叫；尖声地说（或唱），尖声啼鸣；[航海] 吹长哨；

sent.orig: The stuck-pipe soak fluids is: add 100 kg PIPE-LAX into the one cubic meter 0# diesel.
sent.trans: 解卡液配方为：0号柴油一方加PIPE－LAX100公斤。

sent.orig: Plastic pipe, pipe and pipe, seamless pipe of the pipeline system has become a common pipe.
sent.trans: 塑料管、复合管及铜管、无缝钢管成了管道系统的常用管材。

sent.orig: Steel, seamless steel pipe, seamless pipe, precision of the bright, thick-walled tubes and other metal pipe.
sent.trans: 钢管，无缝钢管，无缝管，精密光亮管，厚壁管等金属管材。

sent.orig: Construction industry: pipelines pipes, drains, gas pipelines, water pipe, water pipe, aluminum pipe.
sent.trans: 建筑行业：管道用管、排水管、输气管、饮用水管、喷水管、铝塑管等。

sent.orig: When threading pipe, gauge pipe threads for size length to avoid jamming pipe against seat disc.
sent.trans: 当对管道进行攻丝时，要测定管道螺纹的尺寸和长度，避免将管道塞满阀座和阀瓣。
